text: Sa kho so kālāmā ariyasāvako evaṃ averacitto evaṃ abyāpajjhacitto evaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhacitto evaṃ visuddhacitto
edit: Sa kho so kālāmā ariyasāvako evaṃ averacitto evaṃ abyāpajjhacitto evaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhacitto evaṃ visuddhacitto

translations.transtext: Kālāmas, which that noble disciple, having such a friendly mind, having such a merciful mind, having such an impeccable mind, having such a pure mind,
